message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.EC, cs.DM. 

The paper deals with mechanism design and game theory in the context of facility location games, which are central topics in computer science. The paper presents a new characterization of deterministic strategyproof mechanisms for 2-Facility Location on the line, which is a fundamental problem in this area. The paper also discusses the limitations of deterministic mechanisms for K-Facility Location on the line and more general metric spaces. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.GT (Game Theory and Mechanism Design), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.EC (Economics and Computation), and cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics).
